oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Summer Workshops on Supreme Court Decisions and the Public Schools
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Highlander brochure advertising workshops on integration in public schools. Topics include Army integration, history of segregation, tenure of integrated faculty, and the economics and geography of segregation. The pamphlet outlines a tentative daily schedule and basic information about Highlander. The cost for the nearly month-long program was $150 while the week-long program ran $40.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Highlander Folk School (Monteagle, Tenn.); Segregation in education; Faculty integration; School integration; Community leadership; Public schools; Fieldwork; Rural development; Visual education; Service learning; Faculty integration; American Friends Service Committee; Southern Regional Council; Discrimination; Segregation--Law and legislation
